about_the_game:
Your Inventory

Every decision about which item to put in your backpack and exactly how it synergizes with the rest can be crucial. Your survival depends on your ability to balance risk and reward by strategically planning your actions

Game Features

  • A unique backpack system that allows the player to collect and combine items to create powerful sets

  • Dynamic bullet hell gameplay that will dilute thoughtful backpacking sessions

  • You create your own build that interests you the most

  • Hundreds of items with their own features and use conditions

  • Bosses, each with unique mechanics and features

Craft/Builds

Buy from the merchant and combine different weapons/clothing/amulets and expand your backpack to incredible sizes. Create a class that you like: start as a warrior with great stamina or rebuild into a life-stealing mage, or maybe you like to develop through creature summoning or marksmanship? Your choice is limited only by your skill and luck!

Prepare for a challenge where every battle is a dance on the edge of survival, and every new item could be the key to victory or doom!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence, in the game you can see blood, corpses, skeletons, etc. therefore may not be appropriate for all audiences

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: INTEL HD Graphics 4600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Backpack building but combined with the fast pace of Bullet Hell. Destroy waves of undead, collect soul stones and level up to expand your backpack of powerful items. Combine and upgrade your gear to create incredible builds and come out alive from this carnage!
